r.s: translate lexer files in lex2php format into a PHP 5 lexer
r.d:
Translate a lexer file with a format similar to re2c (http://re2c.org) into a PHP 5 lexer for use with a parser.
Unlike re2c (as of re2c version 0.11), generated lexers are state-aware out of the box.
Generated lexers are very efficient, more than twice as efficient as other alternatives like csLex (written in C#) because they utilize PHP's built-in Perl-compatible regular expressions to lex for tokens.
r.n: - fix Bug #8259: Strange regex generated - fix Bug #8593: if no statename "const 1=1" inserted
